#summary 如何训练crf2模型

= 生成语料 =

{{{
 top=.
source $top/etc/build_settings

wget -O - $corpus_url | gzip -cd > $corpus
$bin/pdc_normalize -v $corpus > ${build_dir}/normalized.txt
$bin/crf2_tool -i ${build_dir}/normalized.txt -o ${build_dir}/pd_crf2_training.txt
}}}


= 训练 =

{{{
crf_learn -t -c 4.0 -f 2 $data_dir/crf2.tmpl ${build_dir}/pd_crf2_training.txt $index_dir/crf2.model
}}}
